title: Looking to create a Silver team
body:
Looking for all positions besides adc.
No need egos.
This team is going to semi serious. Something to get better and chill with.

replies.body: Damage Incorporated is a multi-gaming organization that focuses on competitive play. We are looking for league of legends players of all skill levels to join our LoL Division, XI . All you have to do to join is to visit our website, https://forum.dmg-inc.com/ and get registered on the forums. Next, submit an initiate application and mention that PaladinAngel referred you. From there, you're good to go! You will have access to dozens of player willing to play league with you at any given moment, and will be able to join or create a competitive Leauge team. For example, my team Confirmed Chaos is of players that average from silver to plat elo, all dedicated to improvement. I hope you come join us and have fun with the DI experience!

Mid
